00022 //Read the graph from the file
00023 //File is assumed to be in the DIMACS format
00024 int Graph::readGraph(string file)
00025 {
00026         ifstream graphFile;
00027         char c;
00028         int edges, degree, vlabel, elabel, adjNode, i, j;
00029         int pos, pos2;
00030         int xcoord, ycoord;
00031         int sourceId;
00032         int sinkId;
00033         string line;
00034         EdgeEntry *edge, *reverse;
00035 
00036         //Empty file name
00037         if (file.length() == 0)
00038         {
00039                 cerr << "readGraph: File name must exist" << endl;
00040                 exit(1);
00041         }
00042         else //Try to open the file
00043                 graphFile.open (file.c_str());
00044 
00045         if (graphFile.is_open())
00046         {
00047                 char ch;
00048                 int nodeId, to, cap;
00049                 int numEdges, curNode;
00050                 char* str = new char[10];
00051                 //Read the graph line by line and parse each line
00052                 while (! graphFile.eof() )
00053                 {
00054                         getline (graphFile, line);
00055                         if (DEBUG >= LOG_3)
00056                                 cout << line << " " << line[0] << endl;
00057                         if (line.length() == 0) //Ignore empty lines
00058                                 continue;
00059 
00060                         switch (line.at(0))
00061                         {
00062                         //Comments lines - ignore
00063                         case 'c':
00064                         case 's':
00065                                 break;
00066                         //Source and target
00067                         case 'n': 
00068                                 ch = line[line.find_last_of(" ") + 1];
00069                                 nodeId = atoi(line.substr(line.find_first_of(" "), line.find_last_of(" ")).c_str());
00070                                 if (DEBUG >= LOG_1)
00071                                         cout << ch << " " << nodeId << endl;
00072                                 if (ch == 's')
00073                                         sourceID = nodeId;
00074                                 else if (ch == 't')
00075                                         targetID = nodeId;
00076                                 else 
00077                                 {
00078                                         cerr << "readGraph: Bad Format!" << endl;
00079                                         return 1;
00080                                 }
00081                                 break;
00082                         //Number of edges and nodes
00083                         case 'p':
00084                                 pos = line.find_first_of(" ");
00085                                 pos = line.find_first_of(" ", pos + 1);
00086                                 pos2 = line.find_first_of(" ", pos + 1);
00087                                 nodesNum = atoi(line.substr(pos, pos2).c_str());
00088                                 pos = pos2;
00089                                 pos2 = line.find_first_of(" ", pos + 1);
00090                                 edgesNum = atoi(line.substr(pos, line.length()).c_str());
00091                                 if (DEBUG >= LOG_1)
00092                                         cout << nodesNum << " " << edgesNum << endl;
00093                                 //Create the node array
00094                                 nodeArray = new Node[nodesNum + 1]; //Adding 1 to conform with nodes in graph file
00095                                 //The previous array is used for the dijkstra calculations
00096                                 prevArray = new int[nodesNum + 1];
00097                                 //Set the ID for each node
00098                                 for (int i = 0; i <= nodesNum ; i++)
00099                                         nodeArray[i].setID(i);
00100                                 break;
00101                         //An edge
00102                         case 'a':
00103                                 pos = line.find_first_of(" ");
00104                                 pos2 = line.find_first_of(" ", pos + 1);
00105                                 nodeId = atoi(line.substr(pos, pos2).c_str());
00106                                 pos = pos2;
00107                                 pos2 = line.find_first_of(" ", pos + 1);
00108                                 to = atoi(line.substr(pos, pos2).c_str());
00109                                 pos = pos2;
00110                                 pos2 = line.find_first_of(" ", pos + 1);
00111                                 cap = atoi(line.substr(pos, line.length()).c_str());
00112                                 //Add the edges
00113                                 edge = new EdgeEntry(to, cap, 0, 
00114                                         nodeArray[nodeId].getLastEdge());
00115                                 reverse = new EdgeEntry(nodeId, cap, cap,
00116                                         nodeArray[to].getLastEdge());
00117                                 reverse->setReversed(edge);
00118                                 edge->setReversed(reverse);
00119                                 //Add the edges to the node edge list
00120                                 nodeArray[nodeId].addEdge(edge);
00121                                 nodeArray[to].addEdge(reverse);
00122                         }
00123                 }
00124                 //Finished reading the file - close it
00125                 graphFile.close();
00126         }
00127         else 
00128         {
00129                 cout << "readGraph: Unable to open file"; 
00130                 return 1;
00131         }
00132 
00133         return 0;
00134 }

00165 //Dijkstra's algorithms implemnted, find distances from 'source_id'
00166 //run until you reach the other side (source->target, target->source)
00167 //Save the path in the 'prev' array, max is used to save the max flow available
00168 //on the path
00169 int Graph::dijkstra(int source_id, int* &dist, int* &prev, int &max)
00170 {
00171         int i, tmp_dist;
00172         Node *u, tmp_node, *relocation_node;
00173         EdgeEntry* edge_ptr = NULL;
00174         //The DijkstraQueue class is used here as the priority queue
00175         DijkstraQueue *pool = new DijkstraQueue(nodesNum+2);
00176         bool reverse = (source_id == targetID);
00177         max = INFINITY;
00178         //Reset the dist array for max distance
00179         for (i=1; i<nodesNum+1; i++)
00180                 dist[i] = nodesNum;
00181         //Init the source distance
00182         dist[source_id] = 0;
00183         //Add all the nodes to the dijkstra queue
00184         for (i=1; i<nodesNum+1; i++)
00185         {
00186                 pool->addNode(&nodeArray[i],dist[i]);
00187         }
00188         
00189         //The main loop
00190         while (!pool->isEmpty())
00191         {
00192                 //Get the node with lowest distance
00193                 u = pool->getNode();
00194                 if (u->getID() == targetID)
00195                         break;
00196                 //Get all the edges
00197                 edge_ptr = u->getAdjList();
00198                 if (edge_ptr != NULL)
00199                         edge_ptr = edge_ptr->getNext(); //1st call skips dummy
00200                 //Check all edges
00201                 while (edge_ptr != NULL)
00202                 {
00203                         if (!reverse)
00204                         {
00205                                 if (edge_ptr->isReverseEdge())
00206                                 {
00207                                         edge_ptr = edge_ptr->getNext();
00208                                         continue;
00209                                 }
00210                                 else if (edge_ptr->getResCapacity() == 0)
00211                                 {
00212                                         edge_ptr = edge_ptr->getNext();
00213                                         continue;
00214                                 }
00215                         }
00216                         else //reverse
00217                         {
00218                                 if (!edge_ptr->isReverseEdge())
00219                                 {
00220                                         edge_ptr = edge_ptr->getNext();
00221                                         continue;
00222                                 }
00223                                 else if (edge_ptr->getFlow() == 0)
00224                                 {
00225                                         edge_ptr = edge_ptr->getNext();
00226                                         continue;
00227                                 }
00228                         }
00229 
00230                         tmp_node = nodeArray[edge_ptr->getEndPoint()];
00231                         tmp_dist = dist[u->getID()] + 1;
00232                         //If we found a shorter path we update the node
00233                         if (dist[tmp_node.getID()] > tmp_dist)
00234                         {
00235                                 //Get the node to update from the queue
00236                                 relocation_node = pool->getNode(dist[tmp_node.getID()],tmp_node.getID());
00237                                 dist[tmp_node.getID()] = tmp_dist;
00238                                 prev[tmp_node.getID()] = u->getID();
00239                                 //Insert the node in its new place
00240                                 pool->addNode(relocation_node,tmp_dist);
00241                                 
00242                         }
00243                         //Move to the next edge
00244                         edge_ptr = edge_ptr->getNext();
00245                 }
00246         }
00247 
00248         //Now that the 'prev' array is ready, we can find the max flow available on
00249         //the path between the source and the sink
00250         int t = targetID;
00251         EdgeEntry *tmp_edge;
00252         while(t != sourceID)
00253         {
00254                 tmp_edge = nodeArray[prevArray[t]].getAdjList();
00255                 while (tmp_edge->getEndPoint() != t)
00256                         tmp_edge = tmp_edge->getNext();
00257                 if (tmp_edge->getResCapacity() < max)
00258                         max = tmp_edge->getResCapacity();
00259                 t = prevArray[t];
00260         }
00261         //Free the pool
00262         free(pool);
00263         return 0;
00264 }

00266 //Print the graph
00267 int Graph::printGraph ()
00268 {
00269 
00270         cout << "Source ID: " << sourceID << ", Target ID: " << targetID << endl;
00271 
00272         for (int i = 0; i < nodesNum; i++)
00273         {
00274                 cout << i << " ";
00275                 nodeArray[i].printNode();
00276         }
00277 
00278         cout << "Done printing" << endl;
00279 
00280         return 0;
00281 }

00283 //Show debug information
00284 int Graph::debugDump()
00285 {
00286         cout << "src: " << sourceID << ", dst: " << targetID << endl;
00287         for (int i = 0; i < nodesNum; i++)
00288         {
00289                 nodeArray[i].debugNodeDump();
00290         }
00291 
00292         cout << "Debug end" << endl;
00293 
00294         return 0;
00295 }
00296 
00297 //Increase the capacity of path from source to sink by 'val'
00298 int Graph::incPrevPathCap(int val)
00299 {
00300         int i = targetID;
00301         EdgeEntry *tmp_edge;
00302         while(i != sourceID)
00303         {
00304                 tmp_edge = nodeArray[prevArray[i]].getAdjList();
00305                 while (tmp_edge->getEndPoint() != i)
00306                         tmp_edge = tmp_edge->getNext();
00307                 tmp_edge->incCapacity(val);
00308                 tmp_edge->getReverse()->incCapacity(val);
00309                 i = prevArray[i];
00310         }
00311 
00312         return 0;
00313 }
